"Smart" Oven: An oven that is connected to the internet and can be controlled through a smartphone app. It can also be programmed to preheat based on your schedule and preferences.
"Self-Cleaning" Oven: An oven that uses a special cleaning solution that automatically cleans the oven after every use.
"Eco-Friendly" Oven: An oven that uses less energy and is more environmentally friendly than traditional ovens.
"Multi-Cooker" Oven: An oven that can cook multiple dishes at the same time, such as a roast chicken and a side of vegetables.
"Infrared" Oven: An oven that uses infrared technology to cook food faster and more evenly than traditional ovens.
